trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4CERIGG_00690_CERIGG_000_000<tab>The sin eater Phronesis, one of those damnable Virtues, wanders the wastelands, wreaking havoc on all who pass with his baleful magicks. If only there were a mage of sufficient skill willing to lend ol' Cerigg a helping hand.
TEXT_REGNOR4CERIGG_00690_CERIGG_000_010<tab>Don't you worry, now. Ol' Cerigg will pay you your share of the bounty from his own coinpurse.

TEXT_REGNOR4CERIGG_00690_CERIGG_000_020<tab>For a boy his age, Taynor's got a good head on his shoulders. Why, he's already tightened our finances considerably─mostly by cutting back on my liquor budget.

TEXT_REGNOR4CERIGG_00690_CERIGG_000_030<tab>Good to see you in one piece, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wasn't sure what to expect when I headed outside to investigate the commotion, but I sure as hells didn't expect to see you flying down that cliff.

TEXT_REGNOR4CERIGG_00690_CERIGG_000_031<tab>They say you were on your way to settling the score with your nemesis. And judging by your peaceful expression, I reckon you've done just that. Good for you, my friend. Good for you.
TEXT_REGNOR4CERIGG_00690_CERIGG_000_050<tab>That dwarf can <var 1A 02 /var>drink<var 1A 01 /var>. I feel like there's an axe through my skull and she's completely fine!
TEXT_REGNOR4CERIGG_00690_CERIGG_000_055<tab>I'm glad Taynor's made a friend his own age. Bit on the odd side, but aren't we all?
